sections.title: Darkfire Adept (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Darkfire Adept class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Darkfire Adept)
sections.description: A darkfire adept gains no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Sacred Summons (Darkfire Adept)
sections.description: Darkfire adept gains Sacred Summons as a bonus feat, treating themselves as having an evil aura regardless of actual alignment.

sections.title: Darkfire Taint (Su) (Darkfire Adept)
sections.description: Creates a destructive resonance with a target within 30 feet, granting attack bonuses and imposing save penalties that scale with level.

sections.title: Darkfire Pact (Su) (Darkfire Adept)
sections.description: Choose evil outsider subtypes to gain bonuses against and enhanced summoning capabilities with planar ally and planar binding spells.

sections.title: Darkfire Eruption (Sp) (Darkfire Adept)
sections.description: Sacrifice a 4th+ level spell slot to create an enhanced unholy blight that ignores hardness and disintegrates slain targets.

sections.title: Breaching (Su) (Darkfire Adept)
sections.description: Sacrifice spell slots to bypass magical wards preventing summoning or blocking attacks from summoned creatures of pact subtypes.

sections.title: Breaching Legion (Su) (Darkfire Adept)
sections.description: Summoned creatures from darkfire pact subtypes can use their innate summoning abilities, but those creatures are uncontrolled.

sections.title: Accursed Sympathy (Su) (Darkfire Adept)
sections.description: Increase damage against darkfire tainted targets and gain temporary hit points when killing tainted creatures.

sections.title: Riftward Breaching (Su) (Darkfire Adept)
sections.description: Use immediate action to unleash darkfire eruption against conjured creatures within 30 feet, potentially banishing them to evil Outer Planes.
